title: kAlaDittughaL perA
sahitya:
kAlaDittughaL perAk-kashaDan enakkum un kaDaikkaN irangiDumO


anupallavi

  mAlaDiyAl anda maNNilum viNNilum mamatai piDittalaiyum maDaiyan enaippOl uNDO


caraNam    nAnE kaDavuL enru nAkkinai uruTTuvEn nAmAdi sAdhanam EmATrum puraTTenbEn
kAmAdik-kaLLaraik-kai kaTTit-tAnguvEn kambaLi enreNNik-karaDiyai vAnguvEn un
